attestations.description: List of attestations (e.g., child labor, labor worker attestation), if verified credentials are supported.

carbon_concession_contract_length.description: Whether the concession contract is at least the same length as the crediting period.

carbon_concession_contract.description: Carbon concession contract (free text or link).

carbon_credit_ownership_attestation.description: Indicates possession of carbon credit ownership documentation.

carbon_credit_ownership_documentation.description: Link to the contract of ownership.

child_labor_attestation.description: Compliance with age-related legal frameworks (ILO C138 and/or national laws).

child_labor_documentation.description: Evidence of compliance with age-related legal frameworks.

community_frameworks.description: Measures taken to comply with frameworks governing rights of Indigenous, tribal, and local communities.

cultural_site_borders.description: Project site includes/borders archaeological sites or districts listed in registries.

cultural_site_designation.description: Registry recognition of cultural site designation.

labor_worker_attestation.description: Compliance with labor rights / code of conduct.

labor_worker_documentation.description: Link to evidence of labor rights documentation.

land_right_attestation.description: Possession of evidence of land rights.

land_rights_documentation.description: Link to evidence of land rights.

land_ownership_attestation.description: Possession of evidence of land ownership.

land_ownership_documentation.description: Land or facility ownership documentation (link or text).

legal_compliance_attestation.description: Possession of legal compliance documentation and explanation of how legislation influenced project design.

legal_compliance_documentation.description: Link to the statement of compliance with all applicable national laws.

list_of_landowners.description: List all landowners within project activity (e.g., farmers).

project_governance_structure.description: How the project is governed; stakeholders and decision-making systems.

public_comment.description: Whether there has been any public comment on the project.

public_comment_summary.description: Summary of outcomes of public comment process.

organization_team_experience.description: Overview of team leads' experience and technical expertise; include carbon credit owner details at minimum.

organization_role.description: Organization role(s); carbon credit owner details required at minimum.

organization_project_employees.description: FT/PT employees and contractors who directly work on the project.

organization_employees.description: FT/PT employees at the organization (not directly on the project).

organization_mission.description: Organization purpose, values, and climate-related goals.

organization_legal_name.description: Legal entity name of the organization.

organization_project_experience.description: Total number of projects developed/owned/invested by the organization.

organization_url.description: Verified URL(s) for information about the organization.

previous_project_crediting_program.description: Whether the project is receiving/sought credits under another program (historically or currently).

previous_project_crediting_program_name.description: Crediting program name(s) previously or currently involved.

previous_project_registration_id.description: Registration number(s) for the project under other programs.

previous_project_rejection_date.description: Date(s) of rejection by another crediting program.

previous_project_rejection_reason.description: Program name(s), reason(s), and date(s) of rejection.

current_project_issuance_registry.description: Registry in which the project is currently issuing.
